title: My Shop
body: Is there any way to see what you could have gotten before the shop reset? I was away at my mothers for most of the day and weekend so I couldn't see what I had gotten in the shop and am worried I might lose a skin I really wanted to something I don't want

replies.body: Unfortunately, if you don't get into the shop to reveal the skin offers you had, we actually won't be able to see the offers you got since they were never actually shown anywhere =\ .
Aww that's sad, but thanks for clarification anyway
